item.title: Python and R Studio!
item.description: The ongoing debate about R versus Python is mostly a statistics versus CS/ML debate. Some argue that R syntax is a bit clunkier, while Python syntax is slightly sleeker. Or that R runs slower and Python runs faster. Although this may be true, the Reticulate package allows R and Python to interact together! Firstly, the Reticulate package must be loaded in R. Next, assign a name to an object.
